creator: mark@talios.com
text:
In my WEB-INF/lib directory I have a collection of jar and zip files that are
used by my application (the zip file being oracles classes12.zip), Tomcat
however doesn't pick up this zip file for inclusion in the classpath.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
The spec mandates the use of JAR files. Allowing to use zip files will make 
your application not portable, so we won't support it.
Of course, since this is OSS, you can add that support if you really want to 
(the JAR deployment happens in the org.apache.catalina.loader.WebappLoader 
class).
